mapper.select: SELECT YHBH, RYBH, EUIPZJ, RLZYID, YHDLM, NOTESID, GYH, YHMC, XMQP, SSJG, SSJGBH, SSJGDY, XB, YHLX, GLYJB, RZRQ, JYCD, SDSJ, GRZJLX, SFZH, SR, DHHM, YJ, DZ, SDLX, NOTES邮箱, YZBM, BGSDHZX, BGSDHIP, CZHM, BGSDZ, JTDH, ZT, JLZT, ZW, X, YWMC, YGZT, YGXS, PXH, CJR, CJSJ, ZHXGR, ZHXGSJ, KZZD1, KZZD2, KZZD3, KZZD4, KZZD5, KZZD6 FROM PF_STAFF

SELECT YHBH, RYBH, EUIPZJ, RLZYID, YHDLM, NOTESID, GYH, YHMC, XMQP, SSJG, SSJGBH, SSJGDY, XB, YHLX, GLYJB, RZRQ, JYCD, SDSJ, GRZJLX, SFZH, SR, DHHM, YJ, DZ, SDLX, NOTES邮箱, YZBM, BGSDHZX, BGSDHIP, CZHM, BGSDZ, JTDH, ZT, JLZT, ZW, X, YWMC, YGZT, YGXS, PXH, CJR, CJSJ, ZHXGR, ZHXGSJ, KZZD1, KZZD2, KZZD3, KZZD4, KZZD5, KZZD6 FROM PF_STAFF WHERE JLZT = '1' AND YHBH = #{VALUE,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into PF_STAFF (YHBH, RYBH, EUIPZJ, RLZYID, YHDLM, NOTESID, GYH, YHMC, XMQP, SSJG, SSJGBH, SSJGDY, XB, YHLX, GLYJB, RZRQ, JYCD, SDSJ, GRZJLX, SFZH, SR, DHHM, YJ, DZ, SDLX, NOTES邮箱, YZBM, BGSDHZX, BGSDHIP, CZHM, BGSDZ, JTDH, ZT, JLZT, ZW, X, YWMC, YGZT, YGXS, PXH, CJR, CJSJ, ZHXGR, ZHXGSJ, KZZD1, KZZD2, KZZD3, KZZD4, KZZD5, KZZD6 ) values (#{yhbh,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{euipzj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rlzyid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yhdlm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notesid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gyh,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmqp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssjg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ssjgbh,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ssjgdy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xb,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yhlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glyjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rzrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jycd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{grzjlx,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sr,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dhhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdlx,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{notes邮箱,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yzbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgsdhzx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgsdhip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgsdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{jlzt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{zw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ygzt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ygxs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pxh,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cjr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zhxgr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{zhxgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{kzzd1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kzzd2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kzzd3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kzzd4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kzzd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kzzd6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update PF_STAFF
RYBH = #{rybh,jdbcType=CHAR},
